Subject: Launching multiple jobs at once (wasn't Re: [archive-crawler] Mobile
 User Agent)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=yVv-a3uMJHEpvKMZCWwpl4cMggyrVYOfdBfyISeSnMzR
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

There's no single operation that launches multiple jobs, but by issuing 
several hits in sequence against the RESTful control API, you could have 
the same effect. Just preconfigure the jobs, then do several:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.x+API+Guide#Heritrix3.xAPIGuide-LaunchJob

- Gordon

On 5/23/13 4:34 AM, Smriti Malhotra wrote:
>
>
> Hi ,
>
> Is there a way by which I can trigger launch of multiple jobs
> simultaneously in Heritrix 3.1.1 ?
> thanks
>
